summary: The document is a memorandum from the Deputy Director of Security (Investigations and Operational Support) to the Chief of the Technical Services Division, dated 9 April 1962. It details a request for the preparation of alias documentation for an individual named James Phu, including a California Driver's License and Social Security card, among others. The request specifies the use of provided personal details and a photograph, with a deadline for completion by 1600 hours on 6 April 1962. The documents were to be returned once they were no longer required by the subject.
key_findings: Request for preparation of alias documentation for James Phu.
Documents include a California Driver's License, Social Security card, and others.
Provided details include physical description and personal information.
Deadline for document preparation was 1600 hours, 6 April 1962.
Documents to be returned when no longer needed by the subject.
